The Personal Data Server host. Leave emp: 个人数据服务器主机。默认蓝色网络留空(https://bsky.social)
Your Bluesky handle or email address: 您的 Bluesky 句柄或电子邮件地址
Your Bluesky account password or app pas: 您的 Bluesky 帐户密码或应用程序密码
\nTo authenticate with Bluesky:\n\n1. **:
To authenticate with Bluesky:

1. **PDS Host**: The Personal Data Server host. Leave empty to use the default Bluesky network (https://bsky.social).
2. **Identifier**: Your Bluesky handle (e.g., yourhandle.bsky.social) or email address.
3. **Password**: Your Bluesky account password or app password.

For enhanced security, consider using an app password from your Bluesky account settings.
Create a new post on Bluesky: 在 Bluesky 上创建一个新帖子
Share someone else's post to your timeli: 分享他人的帖子到您的时间线
Get detailed information about a specifi: 获取特定帖子的详细信息
Get a full conversation thread with repl: 获得完整的对话帖子并回复
What do you want to post? (Max 300 chara: 您想发布什么？(最大 300 个字符)
Describe each image for accessibility: 描述每个图像以便访问
Link to video file (MP4, max 100MB): 链接到视频文件 (MP4, 最大100MB)
URL to share with your post: 与您的帖子分享的 URL
Create additional connected posts: 创建附加已连接的帖子
Add hashtags (e.g., tech,bluesky): 添加散列标签(如：技术、 蓝色)
Choose from your recent timeline posts (: 从您最近的时间线中选择帖子(只有在上面选择“从我的时间线”时)
Triggers when a selected author creates: 当选中的作者创建一个新帖子时触发
Triggers when someone new follows your B: 当有人新建关注你的 Bluesky 帐户时触发
Triggers when new posts appear in your t: 当您的时间线中出现新帖子时触发
Triggers when posts match your search cr: 当帖子符合您的搜索条件时触发
Choose from accounts you follow: 从您关注的账户中选择
Include reply posts by this author: 包含此作者的回复帖子
Include posts that this author reposted: 包含该作者重新发布的帖子
Keywords, hashtags (#example), or mentio: 关键词，哈希标签 (#示例)，或提及(@handle) 以查找。
Only posts with/without images: 仅发布带有/不带图像的帖子
Only posts with/without videos: 只发布带有/不带视频的帖子
